project_descr: A regional project aimed at facilitating support and tools for democratic dialogue, as a means for managing social conflicts

outputs.output_descr: Technical assistance to dialogue and other change processes initiatives and programs will be provided at two levels: national demands through the Country Offices, and regional processes and projects.
Strengthened strategic communications and Community of Practice to support the implementation of the Project's activities.

This project was created to support the administrative and finance management for the projects that belongs the Democratic Dialogue Regional Project:  a) Capacity Building; b) Technichal Support; c) CoPL& communications and d) Joint Border Initiative.

This component will include a regional curriculum for dialogue facilitators, mentoring and coaching programs, learning journeys for practitioners, toolkits and virtual courses on democratic dialogue. As capacity building programs are rolled-out, technical assistance will change in nature from direct support to coaching and accompaniment.
